thread.title: "Alaska mulls extra oil drilling ..." Wait For It
thread.title_full: "Alaska mulls extra oil drilling ..." Wait For It

author: RNG
title: "Alaska mulls extra oil drilling ..." Wait For It
text: "Alaska mulls extra oil drilling ..." Wait For It ... to cope with climate change I had to double check that it wasn't the Onion, but no, it is the BBC. Alaska mulls extra oil drilling to cope with climate change - BBC News Quote: Expanding the search for oil is necessary to pay for the damage caused by climate change, the Governor of Alaska has told the BBC. The state is suffering significant climate impacts from rising seas forcing the relocation of remote villages. Governor Bill Walker says that coping with these changes is hugely expensive. He wants to "urgently" drill in the protected lands of the Arctic National Wilderness Refuge to fund them. -~- I had quite the contest in my mind for the right title for this one. But they all missed some element of the story to my mind. Life is weird. Thanks from Camelot , LongWinded and Lyzza
